entry.title: The Black Label to launch first girl group Meovv this year
entry.content: The Black Label will launch new girl group Meovv this year, the agency said Friday in a press release. Meovv is the first girl group that The Black Label will launch since the agency’s establishment in 2016. More information on Meovv will be available at a later date. The Black Label was established by former YG producer Teddy as an affiliate of YG Entertainment.
